name: paytracker-extension
description: Chrome extension for extracting transaction data from PayTracker with advanced privacy features
author: PayTracker Development Team

scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run manifest:version && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.build:release: npm run validate && npm run build:production
scripts.package: cd build && zip -r ../paytracker-extension-v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"').zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:verify: npm run package && echo 'Created: paytracker-extension-v'$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')'.zip' && unzip -l paytracker-extension-v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"').zip
scripts.git:tag: git add package.json static/manifest.json && git commit -m 'chore: bump version to v'$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') && git tag v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run manifest:version && npm run git:tag && npm run build:release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run manifest:version && npm run git:tag && npm run build:release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run manifest:version && npm run git:tag && npm run build:release
scripts.release:dry-run: npm run validate && echo 'Dry run complete - ready for release'
scripts.postrelease: echo 'Release complete! Don\'t forget to push tags: git push --follow-tags'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run security:audit
scripts.validate:full: npm run validate && npm run build && npm run manifest:validate
